Uses of Class
leitej.exception.SeppukuLtRtException

  • Packages that use SeppukuLtRtException 
    Package Description
    leitej.log  
    leitej.thread  

    • Uses of SeppukuLtRtException in leitej.log

      Methods in leitej.log that throw SeppukuLtRtException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Logger.fatal(int exitStatus, java.lang.Throwable cause, java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Object... args)
      Adds log at fatal level.
      If any object in args argument has an instance of exception this method will also send a stack trace of this.
      After add the log this method throws a SeppukuLtRtException with the same message to log.
      void Logger.fatal(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Object... args)
      Adds log at fatal level.
      If any object in args argument has an instance of exception this method will also send a stack trace of this.
      After add the log this method throws a SeppukuLtRtException with exit code 707, null cause and the same message as to log.

    • Uses of SeppukuLtRtException in leitej.thread

      Methods in leitej.thread that throw SeppukuLtRtException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PoolAgnosticThread.workOn(XThreadData xThreadData)
      Adds work to the queue of the pool.
